channel.title: Home Page Request
channel.description: I was wondering if someone could make me a Homepage for my Site JavaIsTheBest. I would like it to be something that you think would represent programming. I would like links to Java Downloads like Netbeans, JDK 6 and many other things that are useful for programming. I'd appreciate this alot.

item.title: Home Page Request
item.dc:creator: @the_angel_of_death the angel of death
item.description:
@the_angel_of_death wrote:

[quote=“Sick of Air, post:15, topic:143571”][quote author=Exception link=topic=196936.msg1759652#msg1759652 date=1189928228]
Well then getting somebody else to make you a homepage is just about the same as ripping one.
[/quote]
Not if you put full credits to the person that made it.[/quote]
Adam told me and person who made got idea from adam i believe and i don’t want ripped one.

Read full topic

item.title: Home Page Request
item.dc:creator: @Exception Exception
item.description:
@Exception wrote:

Well then getting somebody else to make you a homepage is just about the same as ripping one. Why not learn some HTML and CSS and code your own website. There are plenty of great tutorials.

Read full topic

item.title: Home Page Request
item.dc:creator: @the_angel_of_death the angel of death
item.description:
@the_angel_of_death wrote:

Exception:

The homepage you have looks perfectly fine. If you want a new one, I suggest you go to http://www.oswd.org, as nobody here is going to suddenly create you a website.

My homepage is ripped and i just found out i didn’t make it so i don’t want if it’s ripped.

Read full topic
